Hello all,

I'm wargamer, new to this group and to Samurai history in general. My 
interest in Samurai armies is quite recent and I've managed to obtain 
some books from Osprey Publishing (haven't arrived yet). From what 
I've seen the bibliography is very extensive and it's driving me nuts 
just to know were to start. Please, I want your suggestions on just 
the top 5 books on Samurai warfare, arms and armour, it would realy 
help.

By the way, does enyone know if the Portuguese ever employed 
christian Samurai mercenaries in the Far East?

Thanx,

Nuno
